ack.p: We wish to thank Dr. James Fox for his support of this study, mentorship on the project as well as reading and helpful comments of the study design and final manuscript. The influenza A/WSN/33 virus was a generous gift from Randy Albrecht, Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai. All other human viruses used in this study were obtained from the BEI Resources, NIAID, NIH.
